title: Carlos Urías
text:
Carlos Urías (born 1 January 1975) is a <a href="Mexican%20people">Mexican</a> professional <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> in the <a href="Welterweight">Welterweight</a> division. He's the former <a href="World%20Boxing%20Association">WBA</a> Fedebol, WBA Fedecentro, and <a href="World%20Boxing%20Council">WBC</a> FECOMBOX <a href="lightweight">lightweight</a> Champion.
Professional career.
On March 14, 2008 Urías lost to <a href="Mexican%20people">Mexican</a> <a href="Humberto%20Soto">Humberto Soto</a>, the bout was at the Auditorio Benito Juárez in Los Mochis.
WBA Fedecentro Championship.
In June 2008, Carlos beat the veteran <a href="Jos%C3%A9%20Luis%20Soto%20Karass">José Luis Soto Karass</a> by T.K.O. to win the <a href="World%20Boxing%20Association">WBA Fedecentro</a> <a href="Lightweight">Lightweight</a> Championship.
